title: Lag only on LoL
body: I've only been lagging in LoL, all other online games work perfectly. My ping starts out at 30 but frequently spikes to 300 during the game. I have no problems with the client, just the actual game. I'm not sure what I can do to remedy this League exclusive lag. My googling has not yielded any helpful information. Any advice would be greatly appreciated.

I can play a game for 20 mins. No lag, then mid/late game my ping all of a sudden starts to hit 300. spikes down to 60 then back and forth to 300. Been happening periodically for a couple months. I can play any other game for hours, ones that require way more network usage and way more computer stress and no problems. it's just a league issue that they seem to be ignoring. 

Should be looked at. not made excuses for. Do your job.

The vast majority of latency (ping) issues that occur in-game are caused by specific network settings that conflict with League and cause your connection to become *unstable* to our game servers. I strongly recommend working through our [**network configuration guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local settings have been set correctly.

Let me know if these steps caused any change for you.
